sentences.sentence: Myth Two: My wax is 100% carnauba.
sentences.translation: 迷思二：我的蜡是100%纯棕梠蜡。

sentences.sentence: "White" or "Ivory" carnauba wax does not exist, period.
sentences.translation: 纯白“或”象牙白“棕梠蜡是不存在的。”

sentences.sentence: When applied to any surface, carnauba retains these characteristics.
sentences.translation: 不管应用于哪种表面，棕榈蜡都保持这种特性。
